definition: comb/to comb/to weed out/to eliminate/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
lit. to comb one's hair in the wind and wash it in the rain (idiom)/fig. to work in the open regardless of the weather
lined up close (like teeth of a comb)
to work unceasingly regardless of the weather (idiom)
Farrer's scallop (Chlamys farreri), aka Chinese scallop

sentences.english: Whales use their pectinate teeth to gather plankton.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼用牠们栉齿状的牙齿来捉浮游生物。

sentences.english: Fertile spikelets accompanied by pectinate sterile spikelets.
sentences.chinese: 可育小穗伴随着栉状不育的小穗。

sentences.english: In addition, suitable salinity environment can stimulate growth of Bareneck goby .
sentences.chinese: 适宜的盐度有利于裸项栉𫚥虎鱼的生长。

sentences.english: Scorpions have unique sensory combs, called pectines, on their dorsal sides.
sentences.chinese: 蝎子的背侧上长有一排被称之为栉状器的独特感应梳。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the general method of how microcomputer controls the guide bar motion of warp knitting machine.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了微机控制经编机梳栉运动的一般方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the suitable salinity on multiplication and growth of Bareneck goby.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索裸项栉𫚥虎鱼繁殖和育苗的适宜盐度。

sentences.english: This paper studied the contents of nutrition composition of adduct and entrails of Atrina pectinata.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了栉江珧闭壳肌及其脏器的营养成分。

sentences.english: Humphreys will protect towel comb, not only impervious to dust.
sentences.chinese: 堪将护巾栉，不独隔尘埃。

sentences.english: The subfamily Bocchinae is firstly recorded from China.
sentences.chinese: 栉爪螯蜂亚科为中国首次记录。

definition: scalping/to make the head bald (as corporal punishment)
